Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Doppelsemigroup AllSmallDoppelsemigroup is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic Doppelsemigroup of orders 2 to 5.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallDoppelsemigroup">
The output doppelsemigroup are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small Doppelsemigroup
"IsASmallDoppelsemigroup" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic Doppelsemigroup of orders 2 to 5. It returns true if the model is a Small Doppelsemigroup, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallDoppelsemigroup">
